	<title> STAR AUTO, TRUCK ACCESSORIES: AUTO GLASS, WINDOW TINT, CAR ALARMS, CD PLAYERS, BEDLINERS, PAINT PROTECTION FILM, PERFORMANCE PRODUCTS </title>
	<meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=iso-8859-1">
	<meta http-equiv="Content-Style-Type" content="text/css;">
	<meta name="Author" content="Star Auto Accessories">
	<meta name="Keywords" content="Car Radios Stereos DVD Players CD Changers MP3 iPod GPS Paint Protection Film Clear Bra Window Tint  Truck Accessories Trailer Hitches Bedliners Alarms Glass Replacement Windshield Repair Off Road 4x4 HID Radar Detectors Bed Covers Chrome Stainless Steel Intake Exhaust Power Programers Lights Ceramic Tint 3M Solar Guard Grille Guards Running Boards Fuel Tanks  Marine Audio Mobile Video Gold Plating Houston TX 77057 SW Freeway 59 610 Southwest Texas Bed Protection Residential Commercial Tinting">
	<meta name="Description" content="STAR AUTO ACCESSORIES is your one source of aftermarket needs for your car or truck; very conveniently located at crossing of US-59S & Inner Loop I-610W, attends Houston and vicinities customers on personalized basis. With origins on 1982, we at this family owned and operated business are committed and proud to give only our best in customer service and care.
		 The following are just some of the items or services that you can get from Star Auto Accessories; select on the list below, to navigate and get more information on the specific item, or Contact Us:
		AUDIO & VIDEO: Radios, Stereos, Screens, TVs, DVD Players, CD Changers, MP3, iPods, GPS, Subwoofers, Amplifiers, Speakers, Tweeters, Sound Systems, Boom Boxes, etc. 
		PAINT PROTECTION FILM: For Hood, Bumper & Headlights 
		WINDOW TINT: For Automobile, Boat or Architectural needs. 
		CAR & TRUCK ACCESSORIES: Grille & Tail Light Guards, Billet Steps, Running Boards, Nerf Bars, Fender Trim or Flares, Headache & Ladder Racks, Bike & Cargo Racks, Tail Lights, Tonneau Covers, Campers, Bed Extenders, Chest and Tool Boxes, Transfer Tanks, Pumps & Meters, Chrome and Stainless Steel Accessories. 
		TOWING DEVICES: Hitches, Goose Necks, Fifth Wheels, Trailer Wirings, Trailer Brake Controls, Towable Cargo Carriers. 
		PERFORMANCE PRODUCTS: Improved Efficiency Devices, High Performance Air Intakes, Exhaust Systems, Power Programmers. 
		OFF ROAD & 4x4: Tires, Winches, Jacks, Lift & Leveling Kits, HID Lamps, Higher Capacity Replacement Fuel Tanks, Jeep Accessories. 
		LINERS: Sprayed or Drop Bedliners, Rubber Mats, Commercial Van Liners, Insulated and Noise Reduction Liners. 
		SECURITY & EMERGENCY: Keyless Entry, Alarms, GPS Tracking, Spotlights, Back up Alarms, Strobe Beacons, Light Bars, Flashers, Window Screens, Safety Strobe Lights. 
		RADAR DETECTORS: Portable and In Dash, Scramblers. 
		GLASS: Windshield crack repair or replacement, other automotive windows replacement. 
		MISCELLANIES: Car Covers, Seat Covers, Front Masks, Wood Dash, Gold Plating, Head Light Polishing, HID Kits, Smoked Tail Lights, Surveillance Spot Lights. 
		Some popular brands that you may be interested in, are: Kenwood, Panasonic, Myron & Davis, Audiovox, Pioneer, Fusion, JBL, 3M, Solar Gard, Westin, Ranch Hand, Go Rhino, Trail Boss, Cattleman, Aries, BedRug, Undercover, Rugged Cover, Jason, Fold A Cover, Pace Edwards, Roll N Lock, Bushwacker, Stampede, Husky Liners, Nifty, Weathertech, Delta, Weather Guard, UWS, Coverking, Covercraft, Carriage Works, Precision Grilles, RKI, MagnaFlow, K&N, XDI True Flow, AirAid, AEM Brute, Ingen Technology, Volant, AFE Power, Diablo Sport, Diesel Performance, Bully Dog, Superchips, Hypertech, Superlift, ReadyLift, Performance Accessories, Rancho, SuperSprings, Thule, Big Country, Omega, Viper, K40, Caliber, Rocky Mountain, DeeZee, Extang, Warn, PIAA, Whelen, Fill-Rite, GPI, Titan, Royal Purple.
		
		Let us know your needs and we will look for the best options to compare.">
